name: Dragon V Vexingaard
description:
Introducing the expansion for Dragon V Salvation 

Enter Vexingaard a untouched city where dragons roam and magicians collaborate with one another. After Zamarik wakes up inside a mossy cavern he must discover and protect the city of Vexingaard and defend it from the dragon rider order.

This quest is short but does have collectable items which can be found in the vaults when enemies drop the keys for each vault. 

Features

  •  Battle Dragons and their masters
  •  new pieces of gear 
  • Explorable dragon temple and special sealed vaults containing special items
  •  A New enemy Dralok
  • Bronze Dragon Mount 

You do not need Dragon V Salvation to play this mini side quest. But playing Dragon V Salvation may provide context to the in game environment.
